title: Koi wa Itsumo Arashi no You ni
original_name: 恋はいつも嵐のように
sinopse:
Mizuki gets molested on a train bound for school, and the perpetrator is none other than the school president, Azuma! Mizuki gets called to the student council room, where Azuma confesses his love for him. So begins the tale of this wacky, school story.

(Source: 801 Media)
